Actresses Heidi Blickenstaff and Cozi Zuehlsdorff are having a major identity crisis. Well, at least their characters are! The two will be hilariously swapping bodies as the famous mom - and - daughter duo Katherine and Ellie Blake in Disney Channel ’ s new musical adaptation of Freaky Friday. Teens and parents can expect all the familiar touches of the original story, with Katherine and Ellie at odds until an encounter with a magical hourglass leads them to spend a day in each other ’ s shoes — literally.
